#3
```{r}
maizeMean <- function(input){
  data <- read.csv("key_crop_yields.csv")
  myMean <- sum(data[,'Maize'], na.rm = TRUE)/length(data[,'Maize'])
  return(myMean)
}
maizeMean(data$Maize)
```
